monsters.name: Assassin
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment)
monsters.languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

section-traits.label: Assassinate
section-traits.desc: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

section-traits.label: Evasion
section-traits.desc: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

section-traits.label: Sneak attack (1/Turn)
section-traits.desc: The assassin deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc:
+7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

section-actions.label: Light Crossbow
section-actions.desc:
+7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target.
Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

section-actions.label: Club
section-actions.desc:
+2 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Archmage
monsters.resistances: damage from spells; nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing (from stoneskin)

section-traits.label: Magic Resistance
section-traits.desc: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The archmage is an 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile
2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, lightning bolt
4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield, stoneskin*
5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force
6th level (1 slot): globe of invulnerability
7th level (1 slot): teleport
8th level (1 slot): mind blank*
9th level (1 slot): time stop

*The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+6 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-lawful alignment

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc:
+3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Light Crossbow
section-actions.desc:
+3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target.
Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bandit Captain
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-lawful alignment

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Berserker
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any chaotic alignment

section-traits.label: Reckless
section-traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

section-actions.label: Greataxe
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Club
section-actions.desc:
+2 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

section-traits.label: Dark Devotion
section-traits.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc:
+3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Cult Fanatic
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

section-traits.label: Dark Devotion
section-traits.desc: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slot): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
1st level (4 slot): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin

section-actions.label: Quarterstaff
section-actions.desc:
+2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

section-traits.label: Brave
section-traits.desc: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

section-traits.label: Brute
section-traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

section-actions.label: Spear
section-actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

section-actions.label: Shield Bash
section-actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one creature. Hit: (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed one a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

section-actions.label: Spear
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Brave
section-traits.desc: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The knight makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Greatsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Heavy Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Leadership
section-actions.deco: (Recharges after a short or Long Rest).
section-actions.desc: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command of warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throws. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, prestidigitation
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm
5th level (1 slot): cone of cold

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Rapier
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

section-traits.label: Divine Eminence
section-traits.desc: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. this benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flames, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary
2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon
3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians

section-actions.label: Mace
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

section-traits.label: Keen Hearing and Sight
section-traits.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Longbow
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Spy
monsters.skills: Deception +5, Insight +4, Investigation +5, Perception +6, Persuasion +5, Sleight of Hand +4, Stealth +4

section-traits.label: Cunning Action
section-traits.desc: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

section-traits.label: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
section-traits.desc: The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The spy makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Hand Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Thug
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

section-traits.label: Pack Tactics
section-traits.desc: The thug has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The thug makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Mace
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

section-actions.label: Heavy Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Pack Tactics
section-traits.desc: The warrior has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

section-actions.label: Spear
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

section-actions.label: Longsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Heavy Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The abjurer is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The abjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): blade ward, mending, message, ray of frost
1st level (4 slots): alarm*, mage armor*, magic missile, shield*
2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock*, invisibility
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell*, dispel magic*, fireball
4rd level (3 slots): banishment*, stoneskin*
5rd level (2 slots): cone of cold, wall of force
6rd level (1 slot): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability*
7rd level (1 slot): symbol*, teleport
*Abjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

section-traits.label: Arcane Ward
section-traits.desc: The abjurer has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever the abjurer takes damage. The ward takes damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the abjurer takes any remaining damage. When the abjurer casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell.

section-actions.label: Quarterstaff
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The apprentice is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The apprentice has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation
1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The archdruid is a 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, mending, poison spray, produce flame
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, faerie fire, speak with animals
2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, beast sense, hold person
3rd level (3 slots): conjure animals, meld into stone, water breathing
4rd level (3 slots): dominage beast, locate creature, stoneskin, wall of fire
5rd level (3 slots): commune with nature, mass cure wounds, tree stride
6rd level (1 slot): heal, heroes'feast, sunbeam
7rd level (1 slot): fire storm
8th level (1 slot): animal shapes
9th level (1 slot): foresight

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Change Shape (2/Day)
section-actions.desc:
The archdruid magically polymorphs into a beast or elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 9 hours. The archdruid can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The archdruid reverts to its true form if it dies or falls unconscious. The archdruid can revert to its true form using a bonus action on its turn.
While in a new form, the archdruid retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, and Dexterity are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. It can cast its spells with verbal or somatic components in its new form.
The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

section-traits.label: Archer's Eye (3/Day)
section-traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archer can add 1d10 to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Longbow
section-actions.desc: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The bard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following bard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, vicious mockery
1st level (4 slots): charm person, healing word, heroism, sleep, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, shatter

section-traits.label: Song of Rest
section-traits.desc: The bard can perform a song while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra 1d6 hit points if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest. The bard can confer this benefit on itself as well.

section-traits.label: Taunt (2/Day)
section-traits.desc: The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Shortbow
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Blackguard
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The blackguard is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

1st level (4 slots): command, protection from evil and good, thunderous smite
2nd level (3 slots): branding smite, find steed
3rd level (2 slots):blinding smite, dispel magic

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The blackguard makes three attacks with its glaive or its shortbow.

section-actions.label: Glaive
section-actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Shortbow
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Rest)
section-actions.desc: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

section-traits.label: Indomitable (2/Day)
section-traits.desc: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

section-traits.label: Second Wind (Recharge after a Short or Long Rest)
section-traits.desc: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

section-actions.label: Greatsword
section-actions.desc: +9 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

section-actions.label: Light Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, plus (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The conjurer is an 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The conjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): acid splash, mage hand, poison spray, prestidigitation
1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, unseen servant*
2nd level (3 slots): cloud of daggers*, misty step*, web*
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, stinking cloud*
4th level (3 slots): Evard's black tentacles*, stoneskin
5th level (2 slots): cloudkill*, conjure elemental*
*Conjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

section-traits.label: Benign Transportation (Recharges after the Conjurer Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
section-traits.desc: As a bonus action, the conjurer teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. If it instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport swapping places.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The diviner is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, message, true strike
1st level (4 slots): detect magic*, feather fall, mage armor
2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts*, locate object*, scorching ray
3rd level (3 slots): clairvoyance*, fly, fireball
4th level (3 slots): arcane eye*, ice storm, stoneskin
5th level (2 slots): Rary's telepathic bond*, scrying*
6th level (1 slots): mass suggestion, true seeing*
7th level (1 slots): delayed blast fireball, teleport
8th level (1 slots): maze
*Divination spell of 1st level or higher.

section-traits.label: Portent (Recharges after the Diviner Casts a Divination Spell of 1st level or Higher
section-traits.desc: When the diviner or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the diviner can roll a d20 and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

section-actions.label: Quarterstaff
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

section-traits.label: Swift Strike
section-traits.desc: If the fighter makes a dash action in a direct line toward a creature, it may make a single melee attack against it.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The fighter makes two weapon attacks.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Shortbow
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Arcane Trickster
monsters.skills: Deception +5, Insight +4, Performance +5, Persuasion +5, Sleight of Hand +4, Stealth +4

section-traits.label: Nimble escape
section-traits.desc: The arcane trickster can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

section-traits.label: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
section-traits.desc: The trickster deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the trickster that isn't incapacitated and the trickster doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The trickster is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has following bard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): mage hand, vicious mockery
1st level (4 slots): charm person, sleep
2nd level (2 slots): invisibility

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, plus 1d6 poison damage.

section-traits.label: Brute
section-traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bastion hits with it (included in the attack).

section-traits.label: Shelter
section-traits.desc: Allies within 5 feet of the bastion gain a +2 bonus to their AC, if the Bastion is not prone or incapacitated.

section-traits.label: Shield Charge
section-traits.desc: If the bastion moves at least 10 feet stright toward a target and then hits it with its flail on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 (3d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The bastion makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Flail
section-actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

section-actions.label: Javelin
section-actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Block
section-reactions.desc: The bastion adds 3 to its AC against an attack that would normally hit it. To do so, the bastion must see the attacker and be wielding a shield.

section-traits.label: Exceptional Training
section-traits.desc: The beast master can have a bond with one or more beasts from the Monster Manual, as determined by the DM. The beast obeys the master's command as best as it can, and takes its turn on the master's initiative order. As a bonus action, the beast master can command the beast to take the Dash, Disengage, Dodge, or Help action.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The apprentice is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The beast master has the following ranger spells prepared:

1st level (2 slots): animal friendship, speak with animals

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The beast master makes two weapon attacks. In place of one of its weapon attacks, the beast master can command the beast to take the Attack Action. The beast has advantage on attacks it is commanded to make.

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Shortbow
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Still Standing
section-traits.desc: If the brawler has 10 of fewer hit points remaining, it has advantage on attack rolls.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The brawler makes two unarmed strikes.

section-actions.label: Greatclub
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

section-actions.label: Unarmed Strike
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

section-traits.label: Skilled rider
section-traits.desc: Attack rolls made against the cavalry specialist's mount have disadvantage.

section-traits.label: Thundering Charge (1/Turn
section-traits.desc: if the cavalry specialist's mount moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and the specialist hits it with a spear attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The cavalry specialist makes two weapon attacks.

section-actions.label: Spear
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

section-actions.label: Javelin
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Warhammer
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

section-actions.label: Javelin
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Goading Attack (Recharge 5-6)
section-actions.desc: The defender makes an attack which, if it hits, imposes disadvantage on the target if it attacks any creature but the defender on its next turn. The defender's attack also deals an additional 4 (1d8) damage.

section-reactions.label: Block
section-reactions.desc: The defender adds 2 to its AC against an attack that would normally hit it. To do so, the defender must see the attacker and be wielding a shield.

section-traits.label: Suave Defense
section-traits.desc: While the duelist is wearing light armor or no armor and is not weilding a shield, its AC includes its Charisma.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The duelist makes two rapier attacks.

section-actions.label: Rapier
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The noble adds +2 AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Eternal Hunter
monsters.skills: Acrobatics +8, Athletics +5, Nature +5, Perception +7, Stealth +8, Survival +7

section-traits.label: Ethereal Strike (Recharge 5-6)
section-traits.desc: In place of one of its weapon attacks, the hunter, as a bonus action, can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet that it can see, and within 5 feet of a creature against which the hunter makes a shortsword attack that does an additional 13 (3d8) force damage.

section-traits.label: Piercing Arrows
section-traits.desc: When the hunter hits a creature with its longbow, it can make an additional longbow attack against another creature in a straight line up to 30 feet away from the first target. The hunter's arrows are also magical and do an additional 4 (1d8) force damage (included in the attack).

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The hunter makes three weapon attacks.

section-actions.label: Longbow
section-actions.desc: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 2) force damage.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Uncanny Dodge
section-reactions.desc: The hunter halves the damage from an attack that hits it. The hunter must be able to see the attacker.
